statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyEfficiencyRatings WHERE energy_rating > 5;
SELECT manufacturer, appliance_name, energy_rating FROM EnergyEfficiencyRatings WHERE price < 1000.00;
SELECT appliance_name, price FROM EnergyEfficiencyRatings ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyEfficiencyRatings WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung';
SELECT appliance_name, energy_rating FROM EnergyEfficiencyRatings WHERE energy_rating BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_rating, price FROM EnergyEfficiencyRatings WHERE energy_rating > 4 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyEfficiencyRatings WHERE manufacturer='Samsung' ORDER BY energy_rating ASC, price DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, manufacturer, price FROM EnergyEfficiencyRatings WHERE price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY manufacturer, price;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_rating FROM EnergyEfficiencyRatings WHERE appliance_name LIKE '%refrigerator%' OR appliance_name LIKE '%washing machine%';
SELECT AVG(energy_rating) AS average_rating, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM EnergyEfficiencyRatings WHERE energy_rating < 5 GROUP BY manufacturer ORDER BY average_rating DESC, total_records ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_efficiency_ratings WHERE appliance_id = 1;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_rating FROM energy_efficiency_ratings WHERE efficiency_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM consumer_choices WHERE price < 500.00 ORDER BY date_purchase DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_rating, efficiency_score FROM energy_efficiency_ratings WHERE energy_rating = 'A';
SELECT consumer_id, appliance_name, price FROM consumer_choices JOIN energy_efficiency_ratings ON consumer_choices.appliance_id = energy_efficiency_ratings.appliance_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_efficiency_ratings WHERE efficiency_score > 80 ORDER BY appliance_name ASC;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_rating FROM energy_efficiency_ratings WHERE energy_rating = 'A' ORDER BY appliance_name DESC;

SELECT appliance_name, efficiency_score, price FROM energy_efficiency_ratings AS e JOIN consumer_choices AS c ON e.appliance_id = c.appliance_id WHERE price < 500 ORDER BY price ASC, efficiency_score DESC;

SELECT c.consumer_id, e.appliance_name, c.date_purchase FROM energy_efficiency_ratings AS e JOIN consumer_choices AS c ON e.appliance_id = c.appliance_id WHERE e.energy_rating = 'B' AND c.date_purchase BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(efficiency_score) AS avg_score, COUNT(*) AS total_appliances FROM energy_efficiency_ratings;
SELECT * FROM appliances;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_rating FROM appliances WHERE energy_rating = 'A';
SELECT consumer_name, location FROM consumers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT appliance_name, energy_rating FROM appliances ORDER BY energy_rating DESC;
SELECT consumer_name, location, rating FROM consumers JOIN ratings ON consumers.consumer_id = ratings.consumer_id WHERE rating >= 4.0;
SELECT * FROM appliances;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_rating FROM appliances WHERE energy_rating = 'A';
SELECT consumer_name, location FROM consumers ORDER BY consumer_name DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, rating FROM appliances JOIN ratings ON appliances.appliance_id = ratings.appliance_id WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY rating DESC;

SELECT c.consumer_name, a.appliance_name, r.rating FROM consumers c JOIN ratings r ON c.consumer_id = r.consumer_id JOIN appliances a ON r.appliance_id = a.appliance_id WHERE c.location = 'New York' ORDER BY r.rating DESC, c.consumer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM appliance_makes;
SELECT make_name FROM appliance_makes ORDER BY make_name DESC;
SELECT model, energy_rating FROM appliances WHERE energy_rating = 'A' AND make_id = 1;
SELECT make_name, type_name FROM appliance_makes JOIN appliance_types ON appliance_makes.make_id = appliance_types.type_id;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM consumer_ratings WHERE appliance_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM appliance_makes;
SELECT make_name, type_name FROM appliance_makes JOIN appliance_types ON appliance_makes.make_id = appliance_types.type_id;
SELECT appliance_id, model, energy_rating FROM appliances WHERE type_id = 1;
SELECT consumer_id, rating, review FROM consumer_ratings WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT appliance_id, model, energy_rating FROM appliances WHERE energy_rating = 'A';
SELECT * FROM EnergyEfficiencyRatings;
SELECT appliance_name, efficiency_rating FROM EnergyEfficiencyRatings ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, efficiency_rating FROM EnergyEfficiencyRatings WHERE efficiency_rating > 3.5;

SELECT c.consumer_name, a.appliance_name, p.purchase_date FROM Consumers c JOIN AppliancePurchases p ON c.consumer_id = p.consumer_id JOIN EnergyEfficiencyRatings a ON p.appliance_id = a.appliance_id;

SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_appliances FROM ApplianceCategories JOIN EnergyEfficiencyRatings ON ApplianceCategories.category_id = EnergyEfficiencyRatings.appliance_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY total_appliances DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyEfficiencyRatings;
SELECT appliance_name, efficiency_rating FROM EnergyEfficiencyRatings WHERE efficiency_rating > 3.5;
SELECT c.consumer_name, c.address, p.purchase_date FROM Consumers c JOIN AppliancePurchases p ON c.consumer_id = p.consumer_id;
SELECT a.appliance_name, h.efficiency_rating, h.rating_date FROM EnergyEfficiencyRatings a JOIN RatingsHistory h ON a.appliance_id = h.appliance_id ORDER BY h.rating_date DESC;

SELECT c.*, a.appliance_name FROM Consumers c JOIN AppliancePurchases p ON c.consumer_id = p.consumer_id JOIN EnergyEfficiencyRatings a ON p.appliance_id = a.appliance_id WHERE c.city = 'New York' ORDER BY a.efficiency_rating DESC;
